development_milestones: Scientific recognition of pulse benefits (19th-20th century)
Introduction of controlled diets for diabetes management (early 20th century)
Growing research on glycemic index and pulse-based diets (mid-20th century)
Focus on pulses as part of a heart-healthy diet (late 20th century)
Modern dietary guidelines incorporating pulses for diabetic patients (21st century)

Clinical trials on pulse consumption for diabetes

Investigating the role of pulses in preventing diabetes complications
